title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: South Park Elementary, Monday during the day. The kids are out on the playground. The camera pans to the right, showing kids on the hobby elephants, the swings, and the jungle gym. It rests on Butters holding a starting flag.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Wuh-okay! You guys ready up there!?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
role: Sledders	[three teams of four boys apiece] Ready!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: On your marks! Get set! Uh-go!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: We win again!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: That's not fair! Cartman's ass is so fat he makes your sled go faster!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Ey! Don't call me fat, Token!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: We want to use the sleds now, butt pirates!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Sleds are for guys.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah! Why don't you chicks go wash some dishes or get pregnant or something?!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: These are the school's sleds, ass rammers, not yours!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Look, girls don't even know how to sled. Do something else.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: I bet we can sled ten times better than you, doughnut punchers!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh yeah?!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: We'd kick your girlie ass in sledding!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: How about a race down a real hill, then?!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: You got it!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Your best four sledders agains our best four sledders!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Noo problem!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Then we'll see you this Saturday on Phil Collins Hill!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Phil Collins Hill on Saturday! You got it!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: See you there! And may the best woman win, turd burglars!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh, boy! We'll show them!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah. Oo-oo-why, us men will show those skanky hos who's who!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah. Those girls don't realize what good sledders Stan, Kyle, and Kenny are.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah! And with Cartman's enormously fat ass, the boys are sure to win!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Token, I swear to God, if you call me fat one more time  I'm gonna smack you on the head with this rock!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Fatass.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: There!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Heh. Huh. Uh-oh.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Mr. Mackey's office, some time later. Eric and Token are seated inside. Token's right arm is in a sling and his right eye is blackened

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: And what you need to understand is that this is not appropriate behavior, young man! M'kay?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Eric, don't you realize you could've seriously injured your little friend?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: I'm sorry, Mom.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Don't apologize to us, apologize to him!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: I'm sorry, Token.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Well, I hope you learned that throwing rocks is bayad, Eric.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh, I sure do, Mr. Mackey. I mean, I feel really bad, uhh. What was I thinking? The only thing I can do now... is try to go on and live day by day.  See ya later.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Not this time, Eric! You've got to learn to respect your lttle friends! You're gonna have detention for two weeks!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: No way!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yes way! M'kay, and that settles it! Now, let's all go-

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Counselor Mackey?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yes?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: I'm Agent Sharp and this is Agent Keen. We're with  the FBI.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: We're here to investigate the rock-throwing incident.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Nn-um. m'kay, uh, I've already taken care of it; Eric Cartman here is gonna be punished with two weeks of detention.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: I'm afraid it's a bit more complicated than that, Mr. School Counselor.You see, since the victim in this case is African-American, this is considered a hate crime.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: ...What the hell is a hate crime?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Uh, oh, but I don't think this is a ruh-

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: New laws have been passed that make any crime based on race, ethnicity, or sexual orientation a federal offense.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: What? A federal offense?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh no.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh no??

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: We're sorry, Ms. Cartman, but we must follow protocol.  Your son will be taken into custody and then tried in a federal court of law.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh my goodness.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Trial TV, Tuesday. The letters fly into place over blind Justice holding the scales

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: The hate crime trial of the century is underway  on Court TV tracks U van. . Live. Here's your host, Leslie Smith.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: What turns a normal, fat little eight-year-old boy into a vicious, hate-crime-commiting racist? We take you live to the courtroom as the defendant takes the stand.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: The courtroom. The prosecutor grills Cartman

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Mr. Cartman, do you know a boy by the name of "Token?"

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Uh, yes?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Who is Token?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: He's a black kid that goes to my school?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Black!  Did you say black?! You called him black?!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: He is black.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: O! He said it again!  He is African-American, and so you decided to pick him out!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: I did?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: The rage built and built inside your head until it became too much because you hate African-Americans!!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: No! I hate hippies!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: What?!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: I hate hippies! I mean, the way they always talk about "protectin' the earth" and then drive around in cars that get poor gas mileage and wear those stupid bracelets - I hate 'em! I wanna kick 'em in the nuts!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oo, poopiekins?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Ladies and gentlemen of the jury, this is why we have hate-crime laws! This "monster" commited a crimeÂ—not against an individual, but against a race! Do the democratic thing and send his fat little butt to prison!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Ey! Don't call me fat, asshole!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: The prosecution rests.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Don't forget: we still have a sledding race this Saturday, pillow biters.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: We know!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Dude, this is horrible. We gotta get Cartman out of court so we can go practice.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: The courtroom, some time later. A verdict has been reached, and the Judge announces it.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Eric Cartman, you have been found guilty of commiting a hate crime. For this, I hereby sentence you to the Alamosa Juvenile Hall, until you turn twen-ty one.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: No!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: I am making an example of you, to send a message out to people everywhere: that if you want to hurt another human being, you'd better make damn sure they're the same color as you are!  Court is adjourned!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Woohoo! Hooray!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Bailiffs, escort this little bastard to Juvenile Hall.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yes, sir.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Alright, you! ...Uh-uh-uh, where'd he go?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Kenny's house. Cartman rushes up to it and pounds on the front door. Kenny opens the door

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Kenny! Kenny, you have to get me out of town!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: (What the fuck for?!)

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: They're gonna put me in jail for a hate crime! You have to take me to Mexico!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: (Mexico?! Why the heck do I have to take you all the way to Mexico?!)

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Calm down, Kenny!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: (Hey!)

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Do you still have that battery-powered toy truck you got last Christmas?!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: (Yyes)

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Well, come on! I don't have much time!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: NEWS FLASH "High Speed Chase"

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: A car chase is evolving on the 285 corridor east of South Park! Hate-crime suspect Eric Cartman is trying to outrun federal prosecutors in his friend's Go-Go Action Bronco! Our Eye in the Sky Greg Nimins is there live. Greg?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Tom, it looks like the Go-Go Action Bronco is heading east on 285. Police officers are right behind him  but as with any chase, they're keeping a safe distance to avoid any accidents here out on the highway.  Tom, it looks like the fugitive is going to make a bold move off an exit off 285. He's going into a residential neighborhood now; this is where it could get dangerous, as there are pedestrians about.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: In the Go-Go Action Bronco

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Damnit, Kenny! Can't this thing go any faster?!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: (Why don'tcha keep your head down?!)

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: back to the report

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Tom, the police have set a roadblock right where the Go-Go Action Bronco is heading.  This could be the final stand-off.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Alright, that's far enough. Stop the Go-Go Action Bronco and come out with your hands up.  Just bring it to a stop and come on out.  Jeezus, he's gonna ram it!  Crazy son of a bitch.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: NEWS FLASH Continuing coverage. Stan and Kyle watch the news flash at Stan's house

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Well, it's been over thirteen hours now, and still the car chase has not ended.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: What the hell are they doing?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: The chase has now moved through most of Arizona and nears the Mexican border.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Dude, if Kenny takes Cartman to Mexico, how are we ever gonna win the sledding race on Saturday?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Don't worry, dude. That little truck just runs on D batteries. It's gonna run out of juice soon.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: The Arizona desert

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: :	We're gonna make it, Kenny! We're gonna make it to Mexico!  Oh, God damnit!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Stan's house. The phone rings

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Hello?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Just a friendly reminder: Cartman's going to jail and you've got four days until the race, rump rangers!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Son of a bitch!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: A truck arrives at the main gates of a prison in the desert. The gates part and the truck enters

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Here we are, the end of the road. Alamosa Maximum Security Juvenile Hall.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: A few moments later, and Cartman is in an orange prison suit being admitted

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Prisoner 24601, arriving.  Forward, prisoner! You will wake up each morning at 0500.  Lockdown is until 0900. At ten we begin random searches and checks for contraband.  At 11:30 we have naptime, followed by finger-painting. Your cellmate is Romper Stomper!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Huh-who's Romper Stomper?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: I am!  And I don't want no new cellmate!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: You don't have a choice, Stomper! Now, show this new prisoner the ropes!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh, I will!  You bet your ass I will.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Alright, guys. It looks like Cartman's not gonna be able to sled with us for another... 13 years, so in the meantime we need someone to race with us against the girls on Saturday.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah. Cartman's weight was what gave us speed, so we need to find the next-fattest kid besides Cartman.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Come on, who's the second-fattest kid in South Park?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: ...Uuhh, I think Clyde is the next-fattest uh-kid.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Huh?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah. Okay, get over here, Clyde.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: I'm not fat.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Deal with it, dude! Cartman's gone, so now you're the fat kid.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah, fatss! Get your fat butt on the sled!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Hey, I'm not fat, you guys. I'm just kind of big-boned.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Dah, that's what they all say. Okay, ready? Go!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Awwgh! Hey dude, we don't even have enough weight to move.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: See you Saturday, poo sniffers!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Nice going, fat boy!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Alamosa Juvenile Hall. Some of the kids gather around Cartman.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Well, well, well. Nwe fish. How about you come up with a reason why we don't break your arms?!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Uh... 'Cause I'm just like you guys. Uh-I'm one of you.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh yeah? The way I see it, there's two kinds of kids in the world: kids who like Animaniacs, and kids who don't like Animaniacs. You're either with us, or you're against us. So which are you?!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh, uh, well, personally, I... uhuhuhuh, I... don't like Animaniacs?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: ...Neither do we

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh, thank you, Jesus.  So we're friends now?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: No! There's no friends in the Big House! You come in with nobody and you leave with nobody. We don't believe in "friends."

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah, neither do I. Friends suck.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Now, go find me some cigarettes and I'll tell you how to bust out of here.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Phil Collins Hill, second practice run. Kyle and Kenny add the finishing touches to something on the sled

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Okay, we've figured it out. To add more weight to the sled, we're gonna use these bricks , but we're gonna cover 'em with kid's clothes so that the girls think it's another kid!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh, that's a wonderful idea.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: So I don't get to be on the team now?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Shut up, fatass!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah, why don't you go eat some more pork rinds or something, you fat fuck?!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Come on, let's get it a try.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Woopee!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah-

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Wo-o-o-o-oh!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Dude, bail! Bail!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: (Huh? Uh.)  (AAAAAA!)  (Ufff!)  (Ugh!)

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Ooh, my God, we killed Kenny.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: We killed Kenny?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: We Killed Kenny. We're bastards.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Well, that didn't work. What else can we try?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Nothing else is gonna work.  We have to face the fact that without Cartman we're gonna lose to a bunch o' girls.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Well, uh-I sure do hate to, uh, to see my gender tuh, lose to a bunch o' women!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: This is a sad day for men everywhere.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: You know something, guys? I think we all took Cartman's ass for granted.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeup.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: If only we had realized how special our time with his gigantic ass was.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Well, all that time we didn't understand what a... unique and magical ass it was.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Woohoo. Great time, girls.  Oh, gee. Looks like you lost another sledder. Good luck on Saturday, doughnut punchers!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: That does it! We've got no other choice! We've got to bust Cartman out of jail!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Huh?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: How?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: I saw a movie once where they baked a cake and put a nail file inside of it.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Sweet! Let's go!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Hooray! Alright! Here we go!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: And have you been brushing your teeth?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yes, Mommy.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: And not dropping your soap?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yes, Mommy.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Hi, Mom.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Young man, that is the fourth time you've been late for our visiting time; you are grounded.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Grounded? On, no! Um, wait...

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Here you go, boys. Keep it short.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Hey you guys.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Hey, fatass. How's prison?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Well, it sucks balls. Whattaya think?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Cartman, why the hell did you have to commit a hate crime?! We're gonna lose to girls because of you!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah! So you gotta bust out of here. So we made you this cake.  There's a ailnay ilefay inside of it.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: A what?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: An ailnay ilefay.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Wwhat's that?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Listen, aggotfay! An ailnay ilefay so you can eakbray out of isonpray!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah, you stupid umbassday!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: I'd love to eat a cake, you guys, but they don't let us take anything back to the cells from here

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: They on'tday?!  Why the ellhay otnay?! It ooktay ourfay ourshay to akebay this Od-damnedgay akecay, and ownay we're otallytay ewedscray!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: ...Yeah.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Look, that's not important right now! Did you guys bring the cigarettes?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Well, we got some cigarettes, but we don't think you should be smoking. Each year, over a million people die of smo-

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Just hand over the God-damned cigarettes!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Sshh!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Look, if you guys want me back to win the sledding race,  then I need those cigarettes.

text: How are we supposed to give them to you?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Just pass them through these little drill holes here. That's what everybody does.

text: But they're gonna search you on your way back to your cell.

text: I know. That's why I have to have them up my ass.  Shut up, you guys! It's not funny!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Alright, here.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Well, okay... here... l'see...

text: Wow. I really wish I hadn't sat here and watched that.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Me too.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Okay, guys, eh... If you'll excuse me, I must be going now.

text: Don't fart on your way out; you might make little smoke signals.

text: Hahah. Very funny, you guys, hahah.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Alamosa Juvenile Hall, outside the main gate. Stan and Kyle exit and Stan sets the cake on the ground.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: That sucks that we couldn't give him the nail file.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: So now what do we do?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: There's only one thing we can do. We have to go see Token and see if he'll forgive Cartman for hate-criming him. Come on, we're running out of time!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Alamosa Juvenile Hall, Cartman's cell. He enters

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Well, did you get the cigarettes?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yes. They are safely concealed in the depths of my ass.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Alright. Go sit on the toilet and poop them out. I'll keep an eye out for the guards.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Engh. Egh. Uuuh, stupid cigarettes. One.  Heh, two.  Come on! Uugh, come on, now! Come on, uuhhhgghh  yeahhh. Hoh. Phew.  Hoh. ...Oh, God-damnit!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: You flushed them?!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Well, you spend eight years takin' a crap and then flushin' the toilet; it sorta becomes a reflex! Please, just help me bust out of here.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: No way, douche. I told you: I ain't your friend. If you want me to help you, you're gonna have to sneak something else in for me.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Son of a bitch!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: South Park, Friday during the day. Stan and Kyle get off a bus onto an affluent part of town

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Dude, I didn't know Token lived so far away.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah. You know, they bus in people from different races to our school to promote cultural diversity.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah. But isn't Token the only one?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Hello?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Hi. Can Token come out and play?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Well, his head is still a little sore, but you can come in, if you like.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Killer.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Token, you don't wanna see us guys lose to girls tomorrow, do you?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: No.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Well then,  you've got to call the jail right now and tell them that you forgive Cartman for being a dumbass!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: I'm afraid it's not that simple, boys.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: It's not?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: No. You see, the only person that can let Eric out of Juvenile Hall is the governor.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Damnit! Son of a bitch, damnit!  Oh, sorry.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: No, I'b, actually agree with you.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Huh?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah. I have a real problem.with hate-crime legislation. In fact, I'd love to see you kids go down and give the governor a piece of my mind.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Well, why don't you tell the governor yourself?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh, he wouldn't listen to me.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Why not?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Because I'm black.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Sit down, boys. I'm gonna give you a little lesson about hate-crime laws.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Alamosa Juvenile Hall. Cartman is at the toilet pooping something else. Romper is reading

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh, thank God! Oh, thank you, Jesus, uh! Hoh.  Here you go, God-damnit!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Cool! My very own Tic-Tac-Throw game. Ew, it smells, man.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Well, what the hell do you expect, huh?! Now I got your stupid game; tell me how to break out of here!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: You're not gonna break out of here! You're here 'til you're 21, douche!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: But you said-

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: I just wanted you to sneak stuff in for me. What? You actually think I give a crap about you?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: I thought that-

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Hneah. You'd better wise up to the way things work in the big house.  Hey guys! I gots me a new Tic-Tac-Throw  Yeah, it's a little ripe, but it's brand new, man! You can play it at recess.  Hey. Uh, what are you doing?  You... you can't cry in prison, man. They'll bust your head open. What's the matter with you?!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: I want my Mo-omm

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Dude.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Mommy, I want my Mommy!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Look, if it's that important to you, I'll bust you out of here.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: You will?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah. ...Yyeah, I will. Uh-but not because you're my friend. Only because... because I wanna bust out, too. Anh-anh, and see Disneyland.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: The governor's office, day. An aide peeks in

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Governor, the Free Eric Cartman Now Committee is here to see you?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Naw, not another committee. Send them in.  This is the Free Eric Cartman Now Committee?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Well, boys, what can I do for you?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Okay, go ahead and start.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: I don't start, you start.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh, uhyeah.  Hello, Mr. Governor, and thank you for taking the time to hear our presentation on hate-crime laws, entitled, "Hate Crime Laws: A Savage Hypocracy."  Yes, over the past few years our great country has been developing new hate crime laws.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: If somebody kills somebody, it's a crime. But if someone kills somebody of a different color, it's a hate crime.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: And we think that that is  a savage hypocracy, because all crimes are hate crimes. If a man beats another man because that man was sleeping with his wife, is that not a hate crime?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: If a person vandalizes a government building, is it not because of his hate for the government?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: And motivation for a crime shouldn't affect the sentencing.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Mayor, it is time to stop splitting people into groups. All hate crimes do is support the idea that blacks are different from whites, that homosexuals need to be treated differently from non-homos, that we aren't the same.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: But instead, we should all be treated the same, with the same laws and the same punishments for the same crimes . For in that way Cartman can be freed from prison, and we  will have a chance to win the sledding race on Thursday.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: That is our presentation. An idea that we call...

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: "Hate Crime Laws: A Savage Hypocracy."

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Hm. That made the most sense of any presentation I've heard in the last three years.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Outside Alamosa Juvenile Hall, Friday night. Alarms sound and searchlights abound, indicating someone has broken out. Footsteps are heard, and Cartman and Romper climb over a hill

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Hurry up! They're sending the dogs after us!  Mph. Oowww!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: What's the matter?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: It's my leg! I think it's broken. You go on ahead without me.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Uhokay.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Hey.  You're supposed to say, "I'm not going without you," or something.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh. Really?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Look, kid, you go on. You've got something to live out there. You've got friends.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah. I never really realized that until just now.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: I sure would have liked to have seen Disneyland. Here. I want you to have these.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Okay.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: No! You're supposed to say, "I can't take these," or something, dumbass!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh. I can't take these.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Take them. They'll bring you luck. Now go on. Get out of here.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Romper?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: You... well... I know you don't think you've... ever been anybody's friend, but, well, you're a friend to me.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Alright, freeze!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: You'll never take us alive! We're going down together, pigs!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: But you've been pardoned by the governor!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: O ho ho, sweet. Later, dudes.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Phil Collins Hill, Saturday. The sledders are at the top of the run and other kids are at the finish line

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Well, come on! Are we racing or not?!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Just wait. We got Cartman pardoned; he'll be here any second.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: He's gotta show up. He's just got to.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Come on, my feet are getting cold, fudge packers!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah. If you're too scared to race, just say so!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Dude, I guess we've jsut got to try it without him.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Alright, where's Clyde.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Right here.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Get on the sled, you fat piece of shit!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: For the last time, I'm not fat, so stop calling me fat, God-damnit!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: On the sled, fatass!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Okay, girls. Time to show the boys what we can do!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Huh-okay. Uh-ready, uhset,-

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: You guys!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: It's Cartman!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Hooray!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: That's right! I'm back!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh, thank you! Thank you for coming back!  Thank you so much. Thank you.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: What the hell's wrong with Clyde?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: This is your last chance! Are we racing or not?!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: All right! Let's do this!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Okay. Everybody ready? On your marks.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: I hope I can adjust to life outside of the big house.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Uh-get set. Go!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Been on the inside for so long, I don't rermember how to live on the outside.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Go, fatass!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: When a man is stripped of his freedom, degraded in the ways that I was, it's-

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Go, fatass!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Come on! We've gotta catch up to them!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: We've got' em, girls!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh no! The girls are gonna win!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Go! You can do it! Come on!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: We're not gonna make it!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Hey.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: G'aaaaah!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Rowr. {carries the girl in pink away]

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Hooray!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: We did it!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Awww.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: We won! We won!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah. Why, we sure-uh gave those skanky bitches what for!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Hooray!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: It's good to have you back, Cartman.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah,. We're never gonna take you ass for granted ever again.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah, and I'm not gonna take my friends for granted ever again.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Let's all hear it for Cartman's big, fat ass!  Oh-ff.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Do British people count as an ethnicity for hate crimes?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Sweet.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Alamosa Juvenile Hall, later, Romper's cell. He is reading

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Hey! Romper Stomper! Get up!  You got a visitor!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Eric!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Hey, Romper Stomper.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Wow! I've never had a visitor before!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Well, that's not all. I snuck something in for you, too.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: You did?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: You know how you told me you always wanted to see Disneyland?

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Yeah! That's the Pirates of the Caribbean. Ugh.

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Whoa!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Hegh. Oh! Here comes Space Mountain-oh-uugh. Ogh! Wait-

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh, yeah!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Uh, what else?  Splash Mountain, that comes now-oh!

title: CARTMAN S SILLY HATE CRIME
text: Oh, the monorail!
